summary:
*BETA*

Now I've moved into beta, the quest should be working, If you encounter any bugs tell me, as for the recipes, voices and armour, not yet ready. thanks for being with me this early BTW

A small quest line that I plan on expanding. A Witch hunter mysteriously disappeared years ago. When you run into her husband go
descriptionHtml:
===ALPHA===

Disclaimer:
In this mod the quest is the minority of the mod, You will find notes and books and I hope that people have some intuitiveness and will read these and go off on your own accord to investigate and reap the rewards of your curiosity.

1. Info
2. Future plans
3. Requirements

-Info-

"A small quest line that I plan on expanding. A Witch hunter mysteriously disappeared years ago. When you run into her husband gone insane with grief he points to a mysterious dungeon, enter at your own peril and be warned, dark forces have been known to reside within the dungeon."

A fully voice acted with custom made armour that is open ended and allows for choices with different rewards tailored for your decision. I plan on making more quests on top of this to really delve deep into the somewhat "lacking" evil side of Skyrim.

Outside of Markarth a "Crazy man" is encamped, approach him and ask about his wife to start the quest. The dungeon is further down the road.

-Future plans-

I'd like to finish the quest then work on extras like 2 followers which will spawn depending on how you finish the quest. And powerful abilities given by deities and try-hard deities (points at mannimarco)

We are still waiting on the textures and voices so please bear that in mind

-Requirements-
Just the base skyrim as up to date as possible
author: MagnusMac
